hero.title: About BLF
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Cross-border E-commerce

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2020, BLF is dedicated to providing professional cross-border e-commerce solutions for Chinese enterprises. Through years of development, we have become a leading service provider in the industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To help Chinese enterprises go global and achieve international success. We aim to empower more businesses to thrive in the global market through professional services and innovative technology.

advantage.title: Core Advantages
advantage.description: With rich industry experience and a professional service team, combined with advanced technology and data analytics capabilities, we provide comprehensive cross-border e-commerce solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Building long-term partnerships based on trust

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Driving industry development through continuous innovation

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Pursuing perfection to create maximum value for clients

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Working together with partners for mutual growth

team.title: Our Team
